title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document project requirements, user stories, and functional specifications for the MindfulnessAI application.

title: Design User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX)
description: Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes for the MindfulnessAI application's frontend.

title: Develop AI Models for Personalization
description: Design, implement, and train machine learning models to personalize meditation techniques based on user input.

title: Integrate AI Models with Frontend Interface
description: Develop backend APIs to connect the personalized AI models with the frontend interface.
dependencies: Design User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX)

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Create a database schema to store user data, meditation sessions, and AI model responses.

title: Implement DevOps Pipeline
description: Set up continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment (CD) pipelines for the MindfulnessAI application.
dependencies: Design User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX)
Integrate AI Models with Frontend Interface

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing
description: Test the MindfulnessAI application for functionality, usability, security, and performance.
dependencies: Integrate AI Models with Frontend Interface

title: Review and Refine Project Documentation
description: Review all project documentation for clarity, accuracy, and completeness.
